text: using theme fields.json I would change settings for every page within the theme. I want different settings for pages within the same theme. tried `export_to_template_context` but couldnt get it to work :confused:. I am considering one solution where I create a template for every color which would work but not sure if it is the best solution
Its not a HubSpot function, its a macro. Not sure why they are doing it like this
Oh, good catch — I completely overlooked the macro import at the top.
